sentences.english: Those two girls do their hair in the same way.
sentences.chinese: 那两个女孩把头发梳成相同的式样。

sentences.english: A quantitative analysis of the variation pattern of characters of the Viola variegata complex.
sentences.chinese: 斑叶堇菜种宗性状变异式样的定量分析。

sentences.english: We have many patterns and shades for you to choose from.
sentences.chinese: 虢们有许多式样和色彩供你选择。

sentences.english: Mary does her hair after the ancient Greek fashion.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽仿照古希腊的式样做头发。

sentences.english: She said that Jane's new coat was old-fashioned and not worth the money she had paid for it.
sentences.chinese: 她说简的新大衣式样陈旧，不值得她付出的钱。

sentences.english: Three-quarter length sleeves are hot this winter.
sentences.chinese: 七分袖是这个冬季最热门的衣服式样。

sentences.english: They've gone working on this project since last year.
sentences.chinese: 他们从客岁开初永远皆在做这个式样。

sentences.english: The reticulate pattern of minor veins is characteristic of most dicotyledonous plants.
sentences.chinese: 细脉的网状式样是双子叶植物的主要特征。

sentences.english: The house was built after the Chinese style.
sentences.chinese: 那房子是仿中国式样盖的。

sentences.english: The quality is all right， but the style is a bit outdated.
sentences.chinese: 质量没问题，只是式样有点过时。

sentences.english: This kind of style ever prevalent in the world has been out of fashion now.
sentences.chinese: 这种式样曾一度风摩全球，但现已过时了。

sentences.english: This signature will also act as a specimen signature for future correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 日后有关本计划之签署，将以此签署式样为准。

sentences.english: What style furniture do you have?
Look and make it according to the pattern, that was shewn thee in the mount.
sentences.chinese: 要留神按照在山上指示给你的式样去做。

sentences.english: The unpredictable quality of pattern shapes is a big challenge in the fashion industry.
sentences.chinese: 式样外形的品质让人捉摸不定是时尚业最大的挑战。

sentences.english: I like the shape of that table.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢那张桌子的式样。

definition: standardized/standard (service, method etc)/regulation (clothing etc)/formulaic/(telecommunications etc) system/format (e.g. the PAL or NTSC systems for TV signals)
